basic.description: Approaches to dramatic storytelling for the screen. Students analyze examples from existing works and, through practical exercises, prepare a short, original screenplay.
basic.subject: FILM
basic.title: Screenwriting

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite     A GPA of 2.6 in FILM and (a grade of B- in FILM110 or FILM104&106) and 6.0 units in FILM.
